column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I suggest ordering an appetizer while waiting for your deep dish because it takes about 30-40 mins until the pizza is ready. It was fine with us since we had time to digest the stuffed bread. The pizza was cheesy
column2: and filled with fresh ingredients you can taste. It was the most wonderful deep dish I had. If I remember correctly
column3: the small came with six slices
column4: I had two and I was stuffed. I made hubby ate the rest. We couldn't even fit dessert. If you know us
column5: you know we always have room for dessert but not after the great tasting pizza.
